title: xTime - Digital
summary: Digital watch face on your wrist
description: Features: + Simple & modern design + 6 color themes + Current date & weekday + Battery for smartwatch + Pedometer steps from Google Fit + Ambient ModeSettings: + Color themeWorks with Asus ZenWatch, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, LG Watch Urbane, Moto 360, Sony Smartwatch 3, Fossil Q Founder.xTime - Digital is also available for Samsung Gear devices (Gear, Gear 2, Gear S, Gear S2) in Galaxy Apps store.
descriptionHTML:
Features:
+ Simple & modern design
+ 6 color themes
+ Current date & weekday
+ Battery for smartwatch
+ Pedometer steps from Google Fit
+ Ambient Mode


Settings:
+ Color theme


Works with Asus ZenWatch, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, LG Watch Urbane, Moto 360, Sony Smartwatch 3, Fossil Q Founder.


xTime - Digital is also available for Samsung Gear devices (Gear, Gear 2, Gear S, Gear S2) in Galaxy Apps store.
comments: It doesn't keep the same size of the screen. Un installed
